scripts.build: yarn run build:lib && yarn run build:browser
scripts.docs:test: cp browser/float16.js docs/test/float16.js && yarn run docs:test:unit && yarn run docs:test:dependencies
scripts.docs:test:unit: cp test/*.js docs/test && yarn run docs:test:unit:power
scripts.docs:test:unit:power: find test/*.js -execdir bash -c "eval espower test/{} | exorcist docs/test/power.{}.map > docs/test/power.{}" \;
scripts.test: yarn run lint && yarn run test:lib
scripts.clean: rm -rf lib browser docs/test/*.css docs/test/*.js docs/test/*.map
scripts.refresh: yarn run clean && yarn run build && yarn run docs
scripts.prepublish: in-publish && yarn run clean && yarn run build && yarn test
